name: pagesjaunes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool les_pagesjaunes_les_pagesblanche_france.
Tool description: Extraire les données du Pages Jaunes et Pages Blanches scraping email et téléphone 
API description: This function extracts data from the "Pages Jaunes" (Yellow Pages) for a given location and keyword.

pjlocation.description: The location to search within "Pages Jaunes".

pjkeyword.description: The keyword to search for in "Pages Jaunes".
